# 28/30 lunar mansions 𓉔 𓉧 Manazilu ʾl-Qamar

28 ≈ Sidereal month 27 d 7 h 43 min 30 ≈ Synodic month 29 d 12 h 44 min

lunar mansions

28 Zodiacs 28 ≈ 二十八宿 Èrshíbā Xiù

The Sidereal month was at times connected to a 3*9(+1) numbering scheme strongly connected with first millennium BC alphabets:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_numerals

Value Greek Cyrillic 1 Α А 2 Β В 3 Γ Г 4 Δ Д 5 Ε Є or Е 6 Ϛ or Ϝ Ѕ or Ꙃ or Ꙅ 7 Ζ З or Ꙁ 8 Η И 9 Θ Ѳ

Value Greek Cyrillic 10 Ιʹ І or Ї 20 Κʹ К 30 Λʹ Л 40 Μʹ М 50 Νʹ Н 60 Ξʹ Ѯ or Ч† 70 Οʹ Ѻ or О 80 Πʹ П 90 Ϟʹ Ч or Ҁ

Value Greek Cyrillic 100 Ρʹ Р 200 Σʹ С 300 Τʹ Т 400 Υʹ У or Ѵ or ОУ or Ꙋ 500 Φʹ Ф 600 Χʹ Х 700 Ψʹ Ѱ 800 Ωʹ Ѡ or Ѿ or Ꙍ 900 Ϡʹ Ц or Ѧ

1000 was represented with an superscript iota ᶥΒ = 2000

Cyrillic modifying signs 1,000 ҂ Тысяча знак (Thousand mark) 10,000 ⃝ Тьма (Myriad) 100,000 ҈ Легион (Legion) 1,000,000 ҉ Леодр (Leodor, Legion of Legions) 10,000,000 ꙰ Вран (Ворон) Raven 100,000,000 ꙱ Колода (Trough/Log) 1,000,000,000 ꙲ слева Тьма тем (Many Myriad)

Egyptian CUBIT

!()[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cubit#/media/File:Cubit_rod_Turin_Museum.PNG] ≈ 1327 BC !()[https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/85/Measuring_ruler-N_1538-IMG_4492-gradient.jpg]

CUBIT segments:

4 Δ 𓅭 duck of Amenemope cubit ruler MISSING FROM 2nd rod!! Interspersed: 90A 𓁹𓂋𓈖𓆑 𓆓𓋴𓆑 ᵐᶥRenew Joseph TWICE in 2nd Rod! 90B 𓁹𓌴𓈖𓏏𓆑 Mond𓆑 ≈ 𓁹𓂋𓈖𓆑Mund 90C 𓌴𓁹𓈖𓏏𓆑 Neumond

1 α 𓇳 ᵖraᵗ protoˢ proˢ ᵠerst first בראשית be'reshid πraš 2 β 𓆄 shuᵇ shubat ≈ zweit / zwein > •shuni 𒁹𒁹 šina שניים … 3 Γ 𓏘 qu кхоъ qoʾ 𓏘 CIRᶥ ≈ 𓈎 TARᶥ third 4 Δ 𓅭 duck ≈ 𒌉 DUMU ≈ 𓅬 ордек ᶠordek fourth 5 Ε 𓏌𓏏𓇯 ether < 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 < 𓊪 𓏏 𓇯 pẽta® < penta !? <> Ea 6 Ϛ 𓊨𓁹 sees < Osiris ≈ Aššur 𒐀𒐼 60*60 𒀭𒊹 7 Ζ 𓊨𓏏 ṣet < Astate ? Isis™ 8 Η 𓃫 'chaot 9 Θ 𓉠 Nephthys ≈ Nun-phthys 𐦊 𓊪 𓋴 𓆓 ?

10 Ι 𓅩 ver / 𓄿 air ersten first bird'en 𓅃 𓅂 ܛܝܪܐ ṭayrâⁿ ≈ 10? 𒌋 ≈ 𓎆 ≈ Ո "VO" •voI 20 Κ 𓐝𓊃𓏏 m#dwtj µTwenty ≈ ϫⲱⲧ cʳom.Zeit ≈ Chronos 𓊗 vs ⲘⲦⲈ:10 ☑ 30 Λ 𓅭𓅭 lurki??
40 Μ 𓂠𓏏𓆑 ϩⲙⲉ𓎆 hMe𓎆 μ΄ manuty 𔖻 miⁿ māwinzi 𓎆𓎆𓎆𓎆 ორმოცი orMoci <> მეოთხე meotxe ☑ <> налыман nalyman … 50 Ν 𓏁𓇑𓇑𓇑𓆑 nature <> Nut 60 Ξ 𓅝 Thothᶥ ≈ ᵀSixty 70 Ο 𓅮 ophter 𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 avis 80 Π 𓇉𓅚𓅱 pewit 𓅙 90 ϞЧ 𓁹𓐝𓂝𓄿𓍯 qvmar? 𓁹𓅓𓂝𓍯𓅚 numaro?? 𓁹𓌴𓈖𓏏𓆑 Mond𓆑 ≈ 𓁹𓂋𓈖𓆑Mund 100 Ρ 𓁹𓂋𓈖𓆑 𓆓𓋴𓆑 ᵐᶥRenew Joseph? <> 𓏲 ≠ mille 200 σ 𓊾 sign/standard of … 𓆐 𓅄 𓊿 ? 300 τ 𓏙𓅱𓅌 thorn/turn-of-Sopdu ? 󳳃 𓈵
400 υ 𓇼 inverse Sopdu 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 ypsilon 𓇼𓃀𓋴
500 φ 𓏎𓇯 porter/bringer? 600 Χ 𓅩𓇍𓈓𓍯𓅱 great-coming ? 700 Ψ 𓀼 ᵖseat ≈ 𒅆𒁁 šibat 800 Ω 𓋉𓊾 omenga 𓏠 𓈖 see 8 𓋊 Menes 𓃝 900 Ϡ 𓅨𓅨 𓅩𓅩 𓅪𓅪 𓅫𓅫 𓅱𓅱 𓅳 swallows / sparrows?

The Greek alphabet and number system is almost related to the first rod except for the extra entry 𓁹𓌴𓈖𓏏𓆑 between 90 and 100. This is a general problem: we have 27 numbers but 28 days! The second rod is from a side branch in the development of the alphabet dissimilar to greek. The first sifted letters might be explainable, the 𓅝 𓅮 part much less so.

4 Δ 𓏌𓏏𓇯 fourthal 𓏏! < 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 < protheus! 5 Ε 𓊨𓁹 phain = see 6 Ϛ 𓊨𓏏 sitz ≈ six 7 Ζ 𓃫 Set ≈ sept 8 Η 𓉠 Hathor ≈ otto 8 9 Θ 𓅂 ܛܝܪܐ ṭayrâ 10 Ι 𓐝𓊃𓏏 imzehnt ⲘⲦⲈ ☑ vs m#dwtj µTwenty ≈ ϫⲱⲧ 20 Κ 𓅭𓅭 geese? 30 Λ 𓂠𓏏𓆑 Letov 40 Μ 𓏁𓇑𓇑𓇑𓆑 ? 50 Ν 𓅝 60 Ξ 𓅮 70 Ο 𓇉𓅚𓅱 Hop™ 𓅙 80 Π 𓁹𓅓𓂝𓍯𓅚 •pro.macho 90 ϞЧ

There is no clear connection to 3 * 9 = 27 Zodiacs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nakshatra
